_header: Multi multa sciunt / Saint Bernard plainly doth testify
_description: ‘Know Thyself’ — six monorhyming Latin lines alternating with six monorhyming English lines

ExeterSammelband.Transcription:
Multi multa sciuntsent bernard planyly duth testifyseipsos autem
                    nesciuntthe reason ys thys whyalios inspiciuntand punisshys them
                    with owt pyteet seipsos deseruntthou they be neuer so fautytrabem
                    non aspiciuntouer fathers quyt gos bypauperesque affliguntthus
                    all thinges Runys awry
ExeterSammelband.Editions:
Lewis,  Lucy. 
             “Note: A Newly Discovered Lyric from Exeter College, Oxford on the Theme
                of ‘Know Thyself’.” 
             Medium Aevum.
         75 (2006): 123-7: 124.
